sentences.en: Click Update Project to update the project file without sending a reply.
sentences.cn: 单击“更新项目”按钮可更新项目文件但不发送答复.

sentences.en: However, with the following, the UPDATE results are final. Only the PROC call is rolled back.
sentences.cn: 但是, 在以下代码中, UPDATE语句的结果将被写入数据库中.只有过程调用将被回滚.

sentences.en: I would just update them on any news we might have.
sentences.cn: 我们一有新消息我就会告诉他们。

sentences.en: Implement process changes and update in line process parameters.
sentences.cn: 实施工艺更改和更新在线设备参数.

sentences.en: Keep the pre - apparatus's advantage, design new software and update hardware sampling module.
sentences.cn: 在保留已有仪器优点上, 全新设计软件系统,更新硬件采样部分.

sentences.en: Maintain and update consignment stock record , monitor consignment shipments with scheduled deliveries.
sentences.cn: 维护和更新库存数据, 跟踪定期交付货物的出货状态.

sentences.en: Oh, yeah. of course! I need to update my resume first.
sentences.cn: 喔, 是喔. 当然! 我要先更新我的履历表.
例句： 更新生产流程的计划

sentences.en: Sales and purchasing data summarizing, update, analysis and evaluation.
sentences.cn: 销售和采购数据的汇总 、 更新 、 分析与统计.

sentences.en: Schema update failed: There are no link identifiers available.
sentences.cn: 架构升级失败: 链接标识符不可用.

sentences.en: She had heard the news-flash on a TV channel's news update.
sentences.cn: 她在一家电视台的新闻快讯中听到了这则简明新闻。

sentences.en: The current ACIP revision is intended to replace and update earlier guidelines.
sentences.cn: 现行的ACIP修订本更新和替代了先前的指南.

sentences.en: The feedback from the computer enables us to update the program.
sentences.cn: 计算机的反馈能使我们更新程序.

sentences.en: The mobile device tried to update an autoincrement field.
sentences.cn: 移动设备试图更新自动递增字段.

sentences.en: They decided to update the computer systems.
sentences.cn: 他们决定更新计算机设备.

sentences.en: We'll update you on the day's top news stories.
sentences.cn: 我们将为您提供当天的重要新闻。

words.tran_cn: 更新；校正，修正；使现代化

trans.tran_cn: 现代化；更新的信息；更新的行为或事例
trans.tran_en: a change or addition to a computer file so that it has the most recent information

trans.tran_cn: 更新；校正，修正；使现代化
trans.tran_en: to add the most recent information to something

trans.tran_cn: 更新，使现代化，校正，修正
trans.tran_en: to add the most recent information to something
to make something more modern in the way it looks or operates
